creator: Acumatica
descriptionHtml:
An Acumatica license is required to use this app. If you don't have one and want to learn more about Acumatica, visit www.acumatica.com.

Acumatica Cloud ERP Software enables small and mid-sized businesses to access financials, inventory, sales, purchases, and more from any web browser on any device. This allows your entire workforce to get real-time data and manage business processes using an Android device.

Key Features:
- Expense receipts and claims: submit new expenses using the camera on your device to photograph receipts. View submitted expense claims to see if they have been approved.
- Reports and dashboards: view real-time reports and dashboards.
- Time cards: enter time sheets and follow up on tasks.
- Approvals: review and complete approvals in just a few clicks.
Role Specific Features:
- Support: create and work on cases including adding pictures with your camera and taking notes using voice to text.
- Sales: manage contacts, your opportunity pipeline, create sales orders, and check order status.
- Purchasing: manage purchase orders and receipts
- Field services: perform daily appointment work including driving directions, taking notes using voice to text, entering inventory, lookup past appointments, recording time, taking pictures from the job site, and more.

Extensible:
- Developers, partners, and ISVs can create new applets without programming skills so users can access any data or Acumatica screen function.
Cost:
The Acumatica mobile app is available at no extra cost for Acumatica customers. Download the app, login, and begin accessing features.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: - Bug fixes and other user interface enhancements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Enhancements:
- The stability of the file upload and GPS location tracking has been improved for Acumatica ERP 2021 R1 or higher.
- The UI label for the action that starts expense receipt recognition is taken from the server and is localizable.
Fixes:
- If the Ship-To Address information was overriden for a particular opportunity, a user could not close the modal dialog, which popped up when the user was changing the business account value, by using the Cancel button.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Enhancements:
- The Acumatica mobile app supports selecting multiple attributes in a box.
- User accounts are sorted by time of last use, so the most recent user accounts are listed at the top.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Enhancements:
- Now users can crop images before uploading them to the system.
- Now a user can leave a review in Google Play Market right from the app.
- Performance of the "Select all" action in lists has been improved.

Fixes:
- On Android 11, users could not open images or documents attached to records.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Enhancements:
- Now users can open PDF files within the application without having to use third-party PDF viewers.

Fixes:
- If multiple tenants were set up in the system, the list of OpenID providers associated with the tenants was not properly sorted.
- If a user changed the timezone in the device settings, the time in the application was displayed in the old timezone until the application was restarted.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- If the GDPR Compliance Tools feature was enabled on the Enable/Disable Features screen and a user was creating a contact or lead from an image of a business card, the following error message was displayed: Consent to the processing of personal data has not been given or has expired.

- The ability to use the input mask depending on the value of another ﬁeld (for example, the Postal Code ﬁeld on the Contacts screen) has been added.

- Bug fixes and other user interface enhancements.

title: Acumatica

creator: Acumatica
descriptionHtml:
An Acumatica license is required to use this app. If you don't have one and want to learn more about Acumatica, visit www.acumatica.com.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Users can now open hyperlinks added in boxes that contain rich text, such as the Description box on the Cases screen.
- If a user draws a signature and then changes the orientation on the phone screen to landscape, the previously drawn signature is no longer removed.
- If a user selects a file for upload, and the file size exceeds the maximum allowed file size, the system displays an error message.
- On the Opportunities screen, the Contact selector will show only fields that are not hidden.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- The user interface and navigation on the login screen and menu have been updated.
- On some screens (for example, on the Contacts screen), links did not have the http:// or https:// scheme and could not be opened in an external browser.
- On the Appointments screen, the Sign Report action worked incorrectly on certain devices if the device switched to the landscape orientation.
- Bug fixes and other user interface enhancements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- User interface and performance have been improved in several aspects.
- It was not possible to input codes using keyboard on the Pick, Pack and Ship screen on devices with a small display, for instance Zebra TC200j or Zebra TC21.
- Hebrew locale data was not correctly passed during sign-in.
- Users can now re-order KPIs, workspaces, and screens by using long tap and drag, and remove KPIs and favorite screens by swiping.

title: Acumatica

creator: Acumatica
descriptionHtml:

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- The functionality of customizing the layout of the home screen has been added. It requires Acumatica ERP 2022 R2 or a higher version.
- The View on Map action on the Appointments screen now opens the Google Maps application directly if it is installed on the device.
- The algorithm that automatically generates codes for icons in lists has been improved.
- The tremble of the toolbar during transitions between screens has been fixed.

Acumatica Cloud ERP Software enables small and mid-sized businesses to access financials, inventory, sales, purchases, and more from any web browser on any device. This allows your entire workforce to get real-time data and manage business processes using an Android device.

Key Features:
- Expense receipts and claims: submit new expenses using the camera on your device to photograph receipts. View submitted expense claims to see if they have been approved.
- Reports and dashboards: view real-time reports and dashboards.
- Time cards: enter time sheets and follow up on tasks.
- Approvals: review and complete approvals in just a few clicks.
Role Specific Features:
- Support: create and work on cases including adding pictures with your camera and taking notes using voice to text.
- Sales: manage contacts, your opportunity pipeline, create sales orders, and check order status.
- Purchasing: manage purchase orders and receipts
- Field services: perform daily appointment work including driving directions, taking notes using voice to text, entering inventory, lookup past appointments, recording time, taking pictures from the job site, and more.

Extensible:
- Developers, partners, and ISVs can create new applets without programming skills so users can access any data or Acumatica screen function.
Cost:
The Acumatica mobile app is available at no extra cost for Acumatica customers. Download the app, login, and begin accessing features.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- In Acumatica ERP 2022 R1 or later versions, the main menu was displayed incorrectly when a user opened the app by tapping a push notification.
- The contents of folders with subfolders was not shown correctly.

title: Acumatica

creator: Acumatica
descriptionHtml:
An Acumatica license is required to use this app. If you don't have one and want to learn more about Acumatica, visit www.acumatica.com.

The Acumatica mobile app is available at no extra cost for Acumatica customers. Download the app, login, and begin accessing features.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Support of trusted user certificates has been added, which allows the users to access Acumatica ERP sites without proper certificates installed on the server.
- The software component that is responsible for barcode scanning has been updated to improve reliability and performance.
- The layout of the Appointments list has been fixed. This list appeared after a user clicked Appointment History on the Business Account screen.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- The mobile app now supports the dark theme.
- The Search tab has been re-organized to show screens and records simultaneously.
- Two-factor authentication was not working properly if the time on the mobile device was different from the server time.
- Reliability of file uploads has been improved.
- Other fixes and enhancements.

title: Acumatica

creator: Acumatica
descriptionHtml:
An Acumatica license is required to use this app. If you don't have one and want to learn more about Acumatica, visit www.acumatica.com.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Added the tablet layout to the main app screen. Improved the readability of lists and forms on largetablet screens.
- The search on screens is now performed immediately after typing.
- It was not possible to switch to a tenant if the name of this tenant contained the / (slash) character.
- If a document had multiple attachments with the same name, then the wrong file could be shownwhen opening the attachment.
- Other bugfixes and improvements.

title: Acumatica

creator: Acumatica
descriptionHtml:
An Acumatica license is required to use this app. If you don't have one and want to learn more about Acumatica, visit www.acumatica.com.

The Acumatica mobile app is available at no extra cost for Acumatica customers. Download the app, login, and begin accessing features.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- The Acumatica mobile app now displays an error message if a user tries to close a dialog without specifying values for the required fields.

- The support for per-app user preferences has been implemented. With Android 13, it is now possible to change the language of the Acumatica mobile app in the Settings app.

- Bug fixes and other user interface enhancements.

title: Acumatica

creator: Acumatica
descriptionHtml:
An Acumatica license is required to use this app. If you don't have one and want to learn more about Acumatica, visit www.acumatica.com.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Some important actions were moved from the More menu to the new dedicated toolbar displayed in the top part of form screens.
- Some values were not sent to the server immediately after the user entered them in the mobile app, which resulted in the incorrect calculation of discounts in lines on the Sales Order screen.
- Barcodes that had multiple commands encoded were not properly scanned by the default configuration of specific Honeywell scanners.
- Other bugfixes and enhancements.

creator: Acumatica
descriptionHtml:

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- The display of document attachments has been improved.
- The layout of the warehouse management screens has been optimized for devices with small displays.
- During the setup of the user account, if a user typed the server path using the wrong character case (for example, /Acumatica instead of /acumatica), then the contents of dashboards was not shown in the mobile app for this user.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- It is now possible to sort attachments by the Name, Size, and Upload Date
values. This functionality requires an instance of Acumatica ERP 2024 R1 Beta or later versions.
- Quality of images taken via the built-in camera has been improved.
- It was not possible to input numbers with more than 7 digits in total.
- On the Item Lookup screen, when a user selected an item, the list of attached files was not displayed.

Acumatica

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- The mobile app icon and logo have been updated.
- The ability to create expense receipts by sending images from any app to the Acumatica mobile app has been supported.
- Some of the important actions have been moved from the More menu to the new dedicated toolbar that is displayed at the bottom of the list of screens.
- If a phone's locale has comma as a decimal separator, you can now enter any numeric values.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- If a user created an expense receipt through document recognition, opened any tab, and tapped Save, the document was saved without an attachment.
- The autofill service for the Username and Password fields did not work.
- In rare cases, a wrong screen opened after an image had been shared with the Acumatica mobile app.
